page.title: 05WINDSURFING by Jo Gardner
page.content: WINDSURFING by Joanne Gardner Windsurfing is a sport that my Dad does. He has been doing it for three years now.Lots of people have sailboards in Brixham. I think there is a sailboarding club, but I don't know for sure. You need to have the right kind of weather for windsurfing. If it is calm you won't get very far, but if it is too rough then you will find it difficult to get back in again. There are four parts to the wind surfer:-the board which you stand on, the boom, which attaches to the sail, which you hold on to,and the battens which go onto the sail to stiffen it. Yoiu need to be quite tall and strong to windsurf because the sail is quite heavy when it collects a bit of water. You can get different sizes of sail boards.
